parameterdescription.para: points to in-place Q31 data buffer.
bit reversal modifier that supports different size FFTs with the same bit reversal table

briefdescription.para: Processing function for the fixed-point CFFT/CIFFT.

xrefdescription.para:
Do not use this function. It has been superseded by riscv_cfft_q31 and will be removed in the future.
S
points to an instance of the fixed-point CFFT/CIFFT structure
pSrc
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place
none
